name: Mega Man Puzzle Network
description:
https://imgur.com/gallery/qcZ9X

A 2D endless puzzle game based on Capcom's Mega Man Battle Network

- 5 Characters with unique move-sets

- Training room

- Difficulty Selection

- Randomly generated levels

- AI Enemies

Navigate through broken panels, rocks and ice to collect more energy. Try to get as far as you can! Manage your resources and don't use more than you need.

Source Code: https://github.com/fxm84625/Mega-Man-Puzzle-Network
